pages.text: This block allows the user to grind down blocks and items. When using the Mana Grinder on ores, the result is usually better than when put into a furnace or mined by hand./br2This block requires $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)mana/el to work.
Keep in mind that this machine can not run on its own. You need to provide a $(l:e_mana_machine_sources)mana source/el for it to work.
